ygData.subject: Re: Small pyramids
ygData.msgSnippet: if im not mistaken those are the gate used to transport between the zones via wizard transport spells. Lance ... From: Cillo, Christopher L.
ygData.messageBody:
if im not mistaken those are the gate used to transport between the zones
via wizard transport spells.

Lance

-----Original Message-----
From: Cillo, Christopher L. [mailto:CLCILLO@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 10:51 AM
To: 'Innoruuk List'; 'EverQuest'; 'Spoilers'
Subject: [EverQuest] Small pyramids


From: "Cillo, Christopher L." <CLCILLO@...>

What are the small pyramid shapes spread out across Norrath called (not the
road markers)? Has anyone seen these and know what they are used for?

Thanks in advance,

Chris aka Thunderheart
Level 19
Wood-Elf
Druid
Innoruuk server
